trans-unit.source: Contains configuration elements for the NetPipeActivator sharing service.
trans-unit.target: 包含 NetPipeActivator 共享服务的配置元素。

trans-unit.source: The Named Pipe Activation Service manages the lifetime of the named pipe connection, and handles activation requests that arrive over named pipes.
trans-unit.target: 命名管道激活服务管理命名管道连接的生存期，并处理通过命名管道到达的激活请求。

trans-unit.source: This class contains properties that configure this service.
trans-unit.target: 此类包含配置此服务的属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activation.Configuration.NetPipeSection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activation.Configuration.NetPipeSection" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the user accounts for processes that host [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] services and are granted connection access to the sharing service.
trans-unit.target: 获取进程的用户帐户，这些进程承载 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 服务并被授予了对该共享服务的连接访问权限。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activation.Configuration.SecurityIdentifierElementCollection" /> that contains user accounts for processes that host [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services and are granted connection access to the sharing service.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含进程的用户帐户的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activation.Configuration.SecurityIdentifierElementCollection" />，这些进程承载 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 服务并被授予了对该共享服务的连接访问权限。

trans-unit.source: The default values returned are LocalSystem, Admin, NS, LS, and IIS_USRS.
trans-unit.target: 返回的默认值为 LocalSystem、Admin、NS、LS 和 IIS_USRS。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum outstanding concurrent accepting threads on the listening endpoint for the sharing service.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置共享服务侦听终结点上的最大未完成并发接受线程数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum outstanding concurrent accepting threads on the listening endpoint for the sharing service.
trans-unit.target: 共享服务侦听终结点上的最大未完成并发接受线程数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of pending connections for this sharing service.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此共享服务的最大挂起连接数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of pending connections for this sharing service.
trans-unit.target: 此共享服务的最大挂起连接数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the timeout for the NetPipeActivator sharing service.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 NetPipeActivator 共享服务的超时值。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the timeout for reading the framing data and performing connection dispatching from the underlying connections.
trans-unit.target: 此属性为读取组帧数据并执行来自基础连接的连接调度指定超时值。
